Name: Blazted VR
About the game: Well designed Virtual reality, wave base zombie game. Drink beer to regain health with a toggleable drunk effect and kill zombies with cool melee weapons and guns. Features: - Drunk effect (turn on/off) - Cool new maps - Zombie variants - Rush/Wave game mode - 3 different wave modes ... Incase you are wondering: **At a college pub in the middle of no-where Midwest sits 'He' and the other guy** 'Ya know, I want to shoot a bunch of zombies here' He said while slurping his $5 pitcher of beer. 'Sure.. sounds fun' The other said uninterested. 'I bet I could make a video game of it' He said boldly while taking another gulp. 'Could you?' The other asked. 'Sure can... I'll make it Virtual reality too.. Drinking beer and killing Zombies' He said again nonchalant like and took another sip. 'Prove it' The other said. *He stops drinking his beer* ....
